text: I had a question if that’s cool? I was just wondering if we could talk about as you said you’ve got a background in Comp- what do you do? More 2d or 3d? Do you work in Nuke? :relaxed: obviously I know you’ve got NDA and everything so like if I overstep please let me know

I've been locked in the Nuke cage for the last 15 years but I've dabbled a bit with Houdini. At the moment I'm trialing some tracking tools like Mocha or pftrack, but Nuke will always be my main package
Of course, there's a bit of 3d in Nuke
